attributes.comment:
Re: Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit Application and
Petition Fee Schedule (DOCUMENT ID: USCIS-2006-0044-0001)

I strongly oppose the proposed adjustment of application and petition fee.

My company has filed the immigration petition on my behalf last year, so that
the proposed adjustment won't affect me or my company. Similar adjustments have
been made several times in the past decade, however the processing time of
immigration visa has become longer and longer. Based on what I have seen in the
past 10 years, I am not convinced that proposed adjustment will improve the
USCIS service.

USCIS is a government agency and its overhead shouldn't be covered by
application and petition fee. Just like the police department shouldn't count on
speeding tickets to cover its overhead or equipment upgrade.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Liang Yin, Universal Instruments Corp.
